en:
Dear People in Dresden/Leute in Dresden fans,

We are expanding to a new platform! Follow us now on Instagram, and please ask your friends on Instagram to follow us. We will be posting additional material beyond the daily "Person in Dresden," documenting our travels in the city.  We are looking forward to your feedback!

https://www.instagram.com/people_in_dresden/
